text: Mudanya is a town along the Sea of Marmara and also a district of Bursa Province in Turkey. It is located in Gulf of Gemlik. The town has a road transportation with Bursa and seaway transportation by ferries with Istanbul. Mudanya has industrial sector and agriculture sector especially oil production. The town also has a seaport. Category:Towns in Turkey Category:Districts of Bursa Province Category:Marmara Region
title: Mudanya
